citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 AM on
February 28, 2023.
Knocked on the facility door twice, yelled "hello" towards the animals facility twice, texted both cell phone numbers.
Received a text message in reply that the licensee was unable to conduct an inspection today.
Additional Inspectors:
JUSTINE O MALLEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
